abstract: Restaurants at Exit 4 Food Hall in Mount Kisco offer fresh, innovative cuisine served semi-cafeteria style in eco-conscious environment (Metropolitan/Westchester).

headline.print_headline: The Food Hall Trend Has Arrived
headline.main: The Food Hall Trend Arrives in Mount Kisco

keywords.value: Exit 4 Food Hall (Mount Kisco, NY, Restaurant)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: At Exit 4, which offers a variety of cuisines in a setting distinct from the typical food court, the big challenge may be narrowing down your choices.
lead_paragraph: At Exit 4, which offers a variety of cuisines in a setting distinct from the typical food court, the big challenge may be narrowing down your choices.
